reviews.text:
Better than birds of paradise.
The ice cream doesn't melt fast even when it's on a waffle, so it's very pleasant to eat.
You don't eat a wet waffle at all!
The mouth feel is super good, doesn't taste artificial,a legit good ice cream.

I tried 2 of their waffles(normal and red velvet). The waffles were crispy outside and soft on the inside. Really nice to eat but I prefer the red velvet abit more.

In fact, I think it's better than the birds of paradise and they let you taste the flavors. Their durian is way better than birds of paradise.

Highly recommend,you wouldn't regret.

Worth the checkout, the waffles are prepared well with care, really appreciate the care gone into the food. Friendly owner!

Got a 2 piece original waffle + double scoop for $13.10, went along with a mint for her and a mango for myself.

Mango sorbet hit the spot so well, perfect in this hot weather, perfect sweetness and texture for my palate.

Had a bit of mango mixed in with the mint, and that was such a good combo of flavors too.

Mint flavor is definitely above average too, she was happily satisfied.

Amazing gelato and waffles! Loved the red velvet and original waffles, accompanied with pistachio and osmanthus oolong flavoured ice cream. Smelt super fragrant and the taste lived up to the smell. Owner was really friendly too. Will be back! ðŸ˜‹

Been curious and finally had a chance to try it last night. Their biscoff flavour is divine! Really good. Google rating of 4.9 doesnâ€™t lie. You must try it yourself and support local!
Visited again last weekend- superb!
Have been visiting a few times now, love their ice cream!

The pandan waffles, extremely crispy & fragrant. The owner, is super hospitable & inviting!

I came over once to check out the shop and didnâ€™t buy, but he was super polite and thanked me for checking his shop out. Hence I came back again to try.

10/10! $7.60 for ice cream with waffles! Affordable and nice
